Summary: GREAT ROOMS,-  refrigerator, microwave, iron / ironing board, blow dryer, swimming pool, nice towels  NEW MANAGEMENT,   -- once you have stayed at the other places on Beach Blvd, yhen stay here and yu will APPRECIATE rhe difference

Summary Heading: civilized staff. I WAS BURGLARIZED,ON VIDEO, EVERYTHING GONE!
Summary: GREAT CHARACTER ROOMS. STAFF CIVILIZED AND WELCOMING...BUT " at 540 am november 19th the people that stay there month to month broke in and robbed my computer and 5 bags of  all my luggage. CAUTION on your safety
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a 3 night stay at The Dixie, Orange County in August 2019. We were visiting Los Angeles and Hollywood and booked this hotel whilst in the UK. The rooms were clean, and the bathroom was clean also, but the room was in need of a bit of renovation. The AC was a bit old, and again in need of an upgrade but it worked and kept us cool when we needed it. We did not take up the option of breakfast. The hotel was handy for Knotts Berry Farm, and other local attractions. There are plenty of restaurants and bars near by for food and drink Not the best hotel we have ever stayed in, but far from the worst.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The pictures lie, as well as the star rating. This is a, "hotel", it is a disgusting motel! There is the constant smell of smoke and weed outside, the rooms are dirty and run down, the a/c goes on and off, they do not have breakfast as they claim, they don't tell you that they take a deposit, they do not sell tickets, have a working soda or ice machine, and they do not have 24hr service! When I went to call the front desk, the phone in my room wasn't connected and the outletl is blocked, so i couldn't plug it in, they wouldn't answer the outside line snd when i went to the window, the clerk was sleeping on the floor under the desk! I rang and rang, and all he did was stick his hand up from under the desk and wave it in a, "go away", motion. So I had to go back to my room and
Manager Response: none

Summary: When you drive by it is just another hotel on Beach BLVD.  When we checked in and got into our room we were beyond surprised to find a clean and upgraded room with a T.V that has EVERY channel you could ever want. The staff is BEYOND nice and they all go above & beyond to make sure you are always happy and taken care of. Front desk staff are AMAZING & the managers are the BEST!!! I will always stay here when in Orange County  THANK YOU FOR ALL THAT YOU DO TO MAKE THIS PLACE IT IS  JENNIFER GLASIER ROOM #114
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed for 4 nights here as a solo trip at the end of March, I arrived late on my first night but they checked me in quickly and we're extremely friendly. The room was clean and we'll laid out with several novelties such as a fridge. I didn't spend a lot of time in my room during the day as I was exploring the surrounding areas, although Stanton may not be the safest area I felt very secure staying at the Dixie, it's also no longer than a block away to bus routes to Disney, the National Grove, and Huntington Beach. A great stay all in all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: literally a place to crash for the night. no toiletries. it‚Äôs hard to sleep coz the curtains are see-through didn‚Äôt have black-out curtains. also, sheets weren‚Äôt changed- there was hair in between the sheets when i pulled the comforter down. then when i took a shower, there was curly hair rolled in between my towel. i felt so gross, i wanted to leave. this place was very disappointing. i was better off going to a motel 6. this place is not a hotel, it‚Äôs a low grade motel. there was no one at the front desk to check out also. sanitation sucks here and they could at least change the sheets and towels. i‚Äôve never wanted my money back so bad.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Horrible experience. Just pay the extra for a better hotel.
Summary: well to start it off..... We decided we were going to go cheap and the photos fooled us. Room was dirty. asked to have someone retrieve the crusty sock behind the bathroom door. no one came. Sheets were all stained with what i hope was rust. we stripped the bed and I took them down to the front desk because the maids were off already. when i got there the guy took me to their laundry room and handed me another set. after a few sets i settled on the least stained sheets. The towels were of a grade that car washes and rag bags don't even carry. the bed seemed solid till you sat on it or laid in it. you fall into the middle. the area outside was super loud as there was what seem to be a mariachi band blaring into a mega phone somewhere near the "hotel". there was at least two
Room tip: Do not stay here if you value safety and cleanliness
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: If I could give ZERO stars I would
Summary: This hotel is absolutely awful and for the price I really wasn‚Äôt expecting much more then a clean bed and a clean shower and this hotel could not deliver on either. Further more, the hotel didn‚Äôt feel safe at all. When the water was running anywhere in the building the walls were so thin you could hear it in the room as if the pipe had broke and was filling your room with water. The last straw was the yelling and running outside in the middle of the night that made me feel like I was sleeping in the middle of a gang war. We left at 1am and found a new hotel. Never again. I encourage you to look elsewhere.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room is OK, I stays 2 night, the maids only pick up the garbage, didn't make the bed nor give more towers/coffee.  I've traveled a lot for past 45 years and this is this only hotel didn't have rack or closet for you to hang your clothes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Awesome food the lambs fry and bacon is Devine and the lemon pie so yum definatly quality and excellent price between taupo and Devonport these are the best hands down  We look forward to next visit great food
Manager Response: Thanks!

Summary Heading: Blown away by this hotel and customer service.
Summary: My family stayed here for our babymoon vacation. I have stayed in so many more expensive hotels but for the price I paid, I was shocked by the modern room, and the exceptional hospitality that was extended to my family.  Amy at the front desk went out of her way for us and even helped us plan our vacation spots. I couldn't leave without writing this review. Amy if you ever read this, thanks for all you did to help make our vacation successful.
Manager Response: Thank you. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and happy to hear Amy was able to help you with your vacation plans. We hope you will stay with us again in the future!

Summary: For the price I wasn‚Äôt expecting much. Based on the photos I saw prior to checking TripAdvisor I figured I‚Äôd be ok. I was wrong.  The area is really run down and turns out not very safe. All night long there were sirens and one night someone fighting outside.   My hopes were high since I am a fan of older era motels. The look and style is my thing and as long as it‚Äôs clean in the sleeping area I do not complain or expect much. Pulling in and seeing the newer bright orange sign I mistakenly thought we‚Äôd be in for a decent stay. I again, was wrong.   I checked in very quickly through a small window at 1:00 a.m. Saturday morning. The young lady that helped me was fast and as pleasant as one could expect at the hour. She gave me room 216, on the second level. Parking was huge, sort
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. We pride ourselves on being a very clean and well-maintained business that keeps our guests happy and coming back. We appreciate your feedback and will look into the concerns mentioned. We hope you will reconsider staying with us again sometime.

Summary: I have stayed here in the passed and it was okay besides the time my children were taking a bath and water was coming out of the ceiling light in the bathroom right into the tub, This time I booked my room like 3 weeks in advance for them to call me 2 hours before check in and tell me that my reservations were cancelled. I explain to her I am suppose to be checking in in 2 hours with children and now what to do. Lady at the desk said o well I'm sorry there is nothing we can do for you,  I asked to rent another room very rudely she replied no I don't have none available. I will never stay at this place again due to them being so unprofessional and very rude, BEWARE YOU MIGHT NOT HAVE A ROOM TO STAY IN..............
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We sincerely apologize for your negative experience with us. We take pride in our employees and their amazing customer service and will look into this matter.

Summary: My family and I were embarking on a cross country road trip and needed a hotel to spend the night in that was close to the Best Times RV Depot as we were renting a camper from them for it.  We booked two rooms at this location to stay the first night of our trip and the last.  Upon arriving, we checked in and got room keys for two rooms. We requested at least 1 room downstairs for my mother who can't do stairs and they were able to accommodate us. We unloaded our luggage into her room and due to some unrelated issues, we weren't able to go check the room we had gotten keys for upstairs.  We returned later that night, grabbed some luggage from the downstairs room and walked up the stairs, double checked the room number and used our key to enter, however, upon opening the door, it
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. All of our guest's feedback is greatly appreciated and important to us. We apologize for any inconveniences you experienced during your stay and will look into the concerns mentioned. We hope that you will reconsider staying with us again sometime.

Summary: The hotel is convenient to the local Asian community.  The hotel doesn‚Äôt have elevator, the room was smelly, carpet was dirty.  The A/C wasn‚Äôt working, super hot when we opened the room, we have 3 young kids, no onsite tech to fix, so the front desk guy and I both fixed together.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. All of our guest's feedback is greatly appreciated and important to us. We apologize for any inconveniences you experienced during your stay and hope that you will stay with us again.

Summary: Some of the reviews on here are completely untrue so do not believe them. The hotel is a great budget friendly place to stay whilst at Disney. It is about a 15min drive there with lots of free parking. Room is large with king bed, tv, microwave and fridge. Bed was comfy and it was quiet so we slept well. There was bread and some cereal along with tea and coffee available for free in reception but don‚Äôt rely on it for breakfast as there is not much. Room was clean but the floor does need a proper clean as if you walk around without socks on your feet get dirty. I would definitely stay again if I was in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you. Glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again!

Summary: It's cheap and on the affordable side. The gentleman who checked us in was very nice and helped us when our key didn't work. However, when we checked in the trash wasn't taken out, barely any toilet paper and the floors were dirty. Our feet were turning so dark from the ground I couldn't believe it. I must've been checked into a dirty room... I had a reservation for two days but I just couldn't do it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our guest's feedback is important to us and greatly appreciated. I am terribly sorry to hear of your experience with us and will definitely look into the issues mentioned. We pride ourselves on being a very clean and well-maintained business that keeps our guests happy and coming back and we hope that you will stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Positive: Room was clean and not noisy. Beds were clean and comfortable. The location is about 15 minutes from Disneyland. It has a big parking lot. The front desk was friendly.   Negative: The Internet connection is totally useless. The connection interrupts every second and if you get a connection, the speed is so slow that it is almost impossible to do anything. The shower had a shabby and very short curtain. After a 5 minute shower, water is all over the bathroom and runs over the floor to the room. There were no chairs and no table in the room. The breakfast was very poor. There were only some small pastries, yogurt. No milk, no juice, no cereals, no breads, no butter, no cream cheese. They had packaged oatmeal but not on the desk. I had to ask for it every time and the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am sorry for the issues with wifi during your stay and will look into this. Overall, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you'll come again!

Summary: Very basic, not even a chair in the room, the phone was broken at the cord where it inserts into the phone, advised management but nothing was done about it.  No safety lock on the door, old furniture, there was a fridge and microwave.  Towels were small and thin, breakfast was laughable, horrid cheap danish"s and sugar laden bars, only the very early birds would get fruit. The location suited us for the 4 days we were there but that was about all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am very sorry to hear you are unsatisfied with your stay. We pride ourselves on being a very clean and well-maintained business that keep our guests happy and coming back. I will look into these issues mentioned and work hard to fix them., We hope that you will consider staying with us again someday.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights while we were at Disneyland. It may look further away than staying very close to Disneyland however it is cheaper to stay here and get the $10 uber to and from than stay very close! Was clean and simple, what we paid for, staff were lovely and offered to help whenever. They have a free breakfast (yoghurt pastries bananas) this was great to use as snacks for Disneyland as well!  Only negative would be the extremely slow internet, this could be the only improvement needed :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we hope you'll come again!

Summary: stayed there for one was decent enough, nice place to rest your head.  They need help at the front, I had to just leave the room key at the front and called them to tell them I checked out. The room was clean, it was good they had no carpet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. As we have recently been transitioning into our privately owned brand, we are also working on our staff and the proper training. I apologize for any inconveniences you may have experienced during your stay, and hope you enjoyed your overall stay.

Summary: Spending time with family and on a new job. Apples is a sweetheart and helpful at the front desk to check us in. Housekeeping was very nice and all smiles. Our 2 bed room we rented was very nice and beds were comfy. I love the no smoking in rooms or by the building  ( parking lot smoking ) I do smoke also but never indoors, so the room was fresh smelling not like an ashtray even if rooms say smoke free they still carry that tinge smell of cigs. Fridge and microwave is so convenient, fast food everyday is a no go for me, so a few frozen meals are good here and there also. Pool looka great but its way too cold for a dip at this time. The other rooms are quite since we have been here and that's a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. So glad you enjoyed your stay! We hope you will continue to support us as we change brands and stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Relax Area, Everything in room 122 is great for the value of price
Summary: It was great for my family to be there However, the staff couldn't help much, not even a can opener can be provided. Except 1 skinny pretty girl called Apples, she tried to help us positively. Best price motel in Orange Country
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. All of our guest‚Äôs feedback is very important to us and greatly appreciated. We take pride in our great staff that keeps our guests happy and coming back. I am sorry for your experience, but happy to hear that Apples was able to turn things around for you. Overall, we are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will stay with us again sometime!

Summary Heading: Good Motel but my room wasn't that clean
Summary: I was surprised, it was a lot better than the filthy (FILTHY) motel 6 and la quinta inns I've been in. The room was actually nice. Well, for the record, I think their normal rates are 120$ a night, but I got an express deal for 60$ a night.  There are water damages. Understandable, since maybe some college students partied hard before. I won't take it against them. The bathroom floors and main table have water damages. It's fine, I don't mind that.  What I do mind however, is that it felt like my room had been rushed cleaned. I don't even think my sheets have been changed!! The main room itself is nice but the cleanable things have been rushed.   Maybe it's because it's the last room and the cleaning ladies were trying to make it before the 3pm check in time, and they took a lot
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. All of our guests feedback is greatly appreciated and important to us. I am sorry for the inconveniences you experienced and will look into these matters. We pride ourselves in being a very clean and well ran business that keeps our guests happy and coming back. Overall, I am glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you will stay with us again sometime!

Summary: Was a little worried about this place when we drove up, but was surprisingly delighted to see the room when we entered. The wood floors were very nice and the bed was an excellent size with a firm mattress. It could've used a warmer blanket in the cold weather of the month but the heating unit in the room was excellent and kept my husband and me very comfortabe. Everything was clean in the bathroom and besides not having a stopper for the bathtub to soak my feet (after 12 hours at Disneyland) it was very nice. The night window was uninviting when we arrived for a late check in and it took the clerk way too long to check us in when it was late, dark, and very cold outside. However the checkout process took seconds and Apples was an absolute doll. It wasn't too terribly far from
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! I am sorry for the minor inconveniences you experienced and will look into these matters. Overall, I am glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you will stay with us again sometime!

Summary: Always thought of Knights Inn as a step down from Motel 6. This location was awesome!! Okay newly renovated, great beds, blankets, pillows all new! The room was nicely decorated, very large. Bathroom squeaky clean, very quiet toilet. Lots of parking, very quiet area. The curtains were black out type. Just a terrific place to stay! Oh and the Customer Service/Front desk people so sweet. Very professional, quick! They are Marriot/Hyatt quality staff!! I will be back! Thanx guys!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such a wonderful review. i am glad you enjoyed your stay! We hope you will stay with us again sometime!

Summary Heading: Knights Inn tried  to Cancel my reservation to charge someone else a higher rate
Summary: I made reservations for my techs that were working in the area and needed a hotel close to where our job was located at.  The hotel called me to tell me that they had a problem with my credit card, which I took care of right away, then told me that they only had one room left which they could sell for a higher rate and since I was not with my techs they could not check in.  I told the nice person on the phone that they had their own company credit cards and could take care of the bill themselves.  She called me back and said that the manager Carl said no we had to send copies of our ID's fill out paperwork and fax it back.  Where I am located it is a two hour time difference.  I explained to the gal on the phone if I could please talk to Carl the manager that I was having a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. All of our guest‚Äôs feedback is very important to us and greatly appreciated. We take pride in our great staff that keeps our guests happy and coming back. I am sorry for your negative experience with us, and assure you I will look into this matter, as this is the first I am hearing about this issue. I hope that your employees enjoyed their overall stay and you will reconsider staying with us again sometime.

Summary: Stayed the night as I was visiting Disneyland and did not want to drive back home. I did check in late which took around 4 minutes to get my key and sign all paperwork. Got a 1 bed room which was clean and ok for a night. Bed was real comfortable with plenty of pillows.  My only concern would be that shower water was not hot enough for my taste but was able to shower comfortable. Thanks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am sorry for the minor inconveniences you experienced, but happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay. Please come again sometime!

Summary: We stayed there for a last minute Disneyland trip. It was the best value we could find last minute for just over 60 bucks a night and we weren't disappointed at all they looked like they were freshly renovated and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are a new management company that has been slowly renovating the property inside and out, and we appreciate you noticing. I am happy you enjoyed your stay and hope you will stay with us again sometime!

Summary: I went with my family stayed 2 nights. I would stay here again! If your looking for a room just to sleep and cheap yet feel safe this is it! 13 min drive to Disneyland.Front desk nice. Thank you for the breakfast:)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! We hope you'll come again sometime!

Summary Heading: With looking for a room and found a family to
Summary: I needed clean A fordable drug-free room, I found that and a family . The people who work here go out of their way to help you and became friends, A four-star hotel could not have done better .  My ex-wife and grandchildren needed a safe place on a recurring basis . Albert is the night manager at this hotel and he has gone out of his way more than anybody has ever done for my family and I'm very happy to call him a friend when my family is there I know they are safe as long as he's on the job at night. Karl comes on in the morning and I know that they will be safe in the daytime he's really been there for my ex and grandchildren . And housekeeping they don't get enough credit for all that they've done, they have really been there for us .  The rooms were clean and comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you so much! glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again!

Summary: Very clean and quiet. Would highly recommend this place to everyone. Albert did an outstanding job with all my needs and was very attentive.  Will definitely visit here again!  Nicely remodeled rooms with microwave and refrigerator.  No bugs and daily room service.
Manager Response: Thank you! Glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: Angel at the front desk was very professional and accommodating.  He gave superior service and made checking in quick and easy. He made sure I was getting good service and a great room.  I am very satisfied with the service I received today.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!

Summary: Angel here at Knights Inn has been such a nice gentleman and made us feel right at home. I came here with my boys and they think that Angel is very nice. I would definitely come back and recommend a friend to stay. The rooms are nice and clean. And its a great location.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!

Summary: The people in the office were very kind. However, there was no coffee pot, no ironing board, walls were gross with dried up food, tub was so gross, toilet lid was loose, sheets were stained..etc,,etc...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. All of our guest's feedback is important to us and greatly appreciated. I am happy to hear you had great customer service, but regret to hear about the inconveniences you experienced. While we do not supply coffee pots in the rooms, we do offer hot coffee and tea in the lobby 24/7. I sincerely apologize for any confusion about that. As for the cleanliness of your room, I all look into these matters immediately, and take the appropriate actions to take care of these things. I sincerely hope that you will consider staying with us again sometime, and allow us to change your mind.  Sincerely, Knights Inn Stanton Management

Summary: The room was average.   Angel was the best thing of the entire stay.  Prior to our arrival my husband attempted to contact the manager.  After "several" attempts and no contact, thanks to Angel we got our answer.   Upon our arrival, another clerk neglected to inform me of the $100 deposit.  I was unaware due to booking through Travelocity.  I called and spoke to Angel, although I wasn't able to retrieve my cash he was very apologetic and understanding.  Housekeeping never showed up the 1st day,  but Angel personally delivered our needed towels.  I will not be visiting this motel again.  But, I do hope management is aware of the excellent customer service Angel provides for their guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. All guest's feedback is greatly appreciated and important to us. I regret to hear that you weren‚Äôt fully satisfied with you stay. I am sorry for the inconveniences that you experienced and will look into these matters. Overall, I hope you enjoyed your stay and will consider staying again sometime.

Summary Heading: Angel provided us with excellent customer service!
Summary: From the moment we walked in the lobby we felt so welcomed by Angel who provided excellent service! Actual room wasn't great. Beds too soft, carpet icky... But for the price I think it was acceptable.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!

Summary: Angel was awesome. Had a great chat before departing ways. Definitely recommend this place everytime you visit this area! 5 star plus for them. Orange juice and toast for morning meal. Rooms are excellent along with quiet guests for my stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!

Summary: Angel is one of the kindest customer service guys out there man, the guy is so polite and makes you feel like you two have known each other for a long time! If you ever want a hotel on top of free breakfast with great location, INCLUDING THE NICEST DESK GUY IN THE WORLD.. come out here breh
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!

Summary Heading: Best place I've ever stayed while visiting Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed at the Airbnb suite at this place and it was amazing. Not only was the room far beyond up to par, but the staff at the check in desk was great. I have to mention Angel in particular. He was there working the two nights we stayed and he was most gracious. After spending the entire day at Disneyland, we came back to wonderful accommodations. Everyone that was staying there was there for Disney as well and they were from all around the world. It was nice to chat with them and turn in for the night. I will always book this place when we come to visit the area. We were comfortable, lots of places to eat nearby, and very, very close to Disneyland. A real hidden gem!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!

Summary: Had an awesome stay, awesome customer service from Angel. Very polite, very helpful and friendly. Had an issue with the card to access my room and he fixed it in an instant. Definitely recommend staying at Nights Inn because of Angel!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!   Sincerely, Knights Inn Management

Summary: I had a problem with my room key 2 times and Angel was really nice when i told him what was wrong. This is place is great the staff in great. I stayed with my family for 4 nights and never had a problem. thank you :)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!   Sincerely, Knights Inn Management

Summary Heading: My visit was awesome. I shared it with an awesome person and the hotel/motel was awesome.
Summary: The inn was very nice and clean.  The carpet could have been cleaner but I believe they were in the process of remodeling the units.  You have a fridge and microwave which was what I was looking for.  Angel, the person at the front desk was very helpful and explained everything to me with out a fuss.  I cant wait to come back/  I am planning for the next trip today
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Looking forward to your next stay!   Sincerely, Knights Inn Management

Summary: Angel is one of the best hotel front desk people I've ever met. This hotel is such a great place for the $. Ask for Angel when you call in to make reservations and tell them Shannon referred you . Microwave and fridge is a plus, the upgraded rooms are the bomb
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!  Sincerely, Knights Inn Management

Summary: I see others have spoken about Angel the front desk operator.  He should be the owner  (if he is not).  He has super exceeded any expectations I may have had with this property.  Friendly , Professional, this guy cares about the Knights Inn and its guest over and beyond any experience I HAVE EVER HAD... Seriously I have stayed in hundreds of hotels and this is my first review because he deserves it... Great room as well,
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for the review! We are working hard at improving our business, and we are very happy to have Angel as a part of our team. Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!  Sincerely, Knights Inn Management

Summary: Angel at the front desk was super helpful. The staff was generally pleasant, and the environment is quiet. I think it was a good deal for the price it goes for. This was my first trip to Long Beach, so it was a good first impression
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!  Sincerely, Knights Inn Management

Summary: Angel was who I checked in with, and he was very friendly and helpful. I was supposed to check in at 3 PM, but I got there about 15 minutes earlier and he was able to check us in! He was very friendly and helpful! He helped us carry up our stuff even though we said it was okay, he was very nice. He gave us a few tips about going to Universals and around. Great service, friendly!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are working hard at improving our business, and we are very happy to have Angel as a part of our new team. Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!  Sincerely, Knights Inn Management

Summary: We had a great stay at the Knights inn. Angel was very helpful, friendly and put us at ease. This is our first trip to the USA. Angel's help made it easier to find things and gave us information we needed. The room was clean, and the beds were really comfortable. Breakfast was enough for us. If your reading this Angel find me on Facebook.  Regards Shane
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!   Sincerely, Dixie Hollywood Management

Summary: The stay was great thanks to the man at the front desk "Angel"  was more than helpful making sure all my accommodations were met..... let me tell u the name matches the man.. thanks again. The breakfast in the Morning was good I mean how can you go wrong with a bowl of captain crunch.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!   Sincerely, Dixie Hollywood Management

Summary Heading: close to Disneyland, good price. Free breadfast .not bad Wifi
Summary: We booked 2 nights through priceline. as you know priceline only show you a low price but never care of how many people your family has, we have 2 adults and two young kids.and there was only one king bed and was the last one according to our Bid. but the front dest guy named Albert was very nice and provide a mattress to our room with bed sheet and pillow etc for free charging.  This motel has a small pool and free breadfast ,wifi was fast and parking lot was almost full after disneyland closed. the only one thing we dislike was tv. but we really did not have time to watch TV and using their pool. cause disneyland will use all of your power energy„ÄÇ
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!   Sincerely, Dixie Hollywood Management

Summary: I needed somewhere clean, safe and inexpensive to stay a few days for work. I decided to give this place a try. It exceeded my standards. The non-smoking room with the king sized bed was right up my alley. For the money I spent it was more than worth the value. The hotel's desk clerk named Angel was very polite, professional, helpful and accommodating. He made me feel right at home and addressed all my concerns. I will be using this place more often for business trips in the future. Good job and keep up the good work ladies and gents...  Ramond
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again sometime!   Sincerely, Dixie Hollywood Management

Summary Heading: Perfect place to crash after a long day at Disneyland
Summary: It was my first time going on a short vacation alone and I must say Knights Inn is a perfect place for a place to sleep and stay at. The place was clean and people are nice. The owner greeted me on the first day and made sure I was comfortable. He was willing to help me when the connection of the TV and cable weren't working. The only thing I didn't like was that I had 15 minutes before checkout and the owner went knocking on the door, saying it was check out time. Other than that, I would recommend this inn for anyone, especially families who are looking for a cheaper place to stay that is only 13 mins away from Disneyland  and want their money to go a long way while they are here exploring their surroundings.
Manager Response: Dear Camille, Thank you so much for your review. I am sorry about the rude knocking at your door upon check in. I have spoken to the manager since then to make sure that he stops doing that. other than that, it sounds like you enjoyed your stay. I hope you will consider staying with us again sometime!

Summary: Typical american motel room. I really appreciated the non-smoking in room policy. Really seem to work out. Rooms were simple, but didn't smell bad. Breakfast very basic. Good location if going to Anaheim Convention Center or Disneyland. Quite close to Santa Ana - Orange County Airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! All of our guest's feedback is greatly appreciated! Glad you enjoyed your stay! Please come again!

Summary: Loud/guest all night long. Moldy shower curtain. Employees standing right outside our window talking loudly a lot. Employees disregarding do not disturb sign. Quoted $100 less than was charged. Poor selection for breakfast. Construction going on with no notice to guest.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen, Thank you for your review. All of our guest's feedback is important to us and greatly appreciated. I regret to hear that you weren't fully satisfied with your stay. We pride ourselves in being a very clean and well ran business that continues to keep our guests happy and coming back. We are a new management company that has recently taken over the property, and we are striving to make this property the best it's ever been. While doing so, it is undergoing renovations, in which we try keep the construction to daytime business hours only. I am sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused you, but strongly hope that you will reconsider staying with us again sometime to see the improvements we have made.

Summary Heading: It was average and ok. Rooms are very cheap so don't expect a lot.
Summary: We booked the 3 queen bed room and it was spacious and somewhat clean but older. There were stains here and there and maybe one or two very small cockroaches but nothing to freak out about. The location is in a shady neighborhood. The wifi was ok and the beds were old. Bring your own towels and bedding, if possible, because they are very thin. The management will knock on your door about 10 minutes from check-out and your key will be deactivated so make sure you check out on time. Would I stay here again? Probably not but I did have a good time, regardless.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Tall Dave, Thank you so much for your review. All of our guest's feedback is greatly appreciated. I am sorry to hear of your negative experience with us. We are a new management company that has recently taken over the property and we are striving towards making this property a better place. The property has been undergoing renovations since your stay, in which the room you stayed in is now a more spacious, 4 bedroom suite, with a brand new bathroom and all. We have also trained the current staff, as well as brought in new staff, to create a more enjoyable experience for our guests. Again, I sincerely apologize for your experience, and hope you'll consider staying with us again sometime to see our improvements!

Summary Heading: Aging property in need of updating (and maintenance)
Summary: Here's one from the "you get what you pay for" department.  My wife never felt the room was clean enough.  I thought it was just showing wear.  There were definitely old stains and marks, and the shower curtain rod was coming out of the wall, but for the money it provided us with a place to sleep.  Period.  Staff was not very communicative.  Breakfast is very meager.  But location is good if you're going to Knott's or Disney and you have a car.  Very basic.  Very old.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. All of our guest's feedback is greatly appreciated. I am sorry to hear of your negative experience with us. We are a new management company that has recently taken over the property and we are striving towards making this property a better place. The property has been undergoing renovations since your stay, in which the all of the rooms have received new furniture, new flooring, new paint, and any other smaller maintenance that we felt it needed. We have also trained the current staff, as well as brought in new staff, to create a more enjoyable experience for our guests. Again, I sincerely apologize, and hope that you will come back again sometime to see all of the improvements we have made!

Summary: Round the corner from Disney. Area is a bit suspect, but on the whole good enough for a couple of nights. Needs some renovation to fixtures/fittings etc. Example the light in the bathroom was broken (flashed and buzzed).  As I say, not saying its a bad place, just needs some refinement and renovation.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. All of our guest's feedback is greatly appreciated. I am sorry to hear of your negative experience with us. We are a new management company that has recently taken over the property and we are striving towards making this property a better place. The property has been undergoing renovations since your stay, in which the all of the rooms have received new furniture, new flooring, new paint, and any other smaller maintenance that we felt it needed. We have also trained the current staff, as well as brought in new staff, to create a more enjoyable experience for our guests. Again, I sincerely apologize, and hope that you will come back again sometime to see all of the improvements we have made!

Summary: we stayed 5 nights here in june it was ok when we booked it stated breakfast was included upon arrival was told this was not so only coffee, we did have a fridge and microwave so ws able to go to walmart and gt a few cheap things for breakfast, small pool and spa was not working at the time, room was clean however you had to request housekeeping thought this a bit funny, neighbourhood ok a few fast food places within walking distance
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms are disgusting, don't take your shoes off or your feet will become black, the maids steal your stuff while your away, and there's mold in the shower. Don't stay here if you get the night free!! The wifi is also incredibly slow.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Dirty and insecurity   All is dirty in that hotel like the manager! We have reserved 12 rooms: all are dirties. Carpet smell bad, foot are blacks when walking in room, towels are not white but all colours. Homeless come back in hotel and sleep in rooms. Scandalous : the manager and his family love money. You pay all!!! The daughter have refused to print only one voucher, if you lost or don't return your key at check out the manager charge 5$. It was the last Time!!!  Dirty!
Manager Response: none

Summary: first, when you book this hotel, they automatically charge your card, before the date that you check in.  We booked this hotel for our Disney trip.  you basically get less than you pay for, the room is not well cleaned, there is only one towel per room.  They charge your card for the reservation not like most hotels that wait til the time of check out.  Their continental breakfast that is  listed on the website is COFFEE, and horrible coffee at that.  My Advise find a different hotel.  I KNOW WE WILL NEVER STAY HERE AGAIN.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They say a picture says a thousand words and I took five because I can't believe how terrible this place is. The first thing I did when I arrived was wipe down the toilet myself. There was unidentifiable trash in the waste basket and I bought bottled water to brush my teeth. It's definitely a discount hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I booked here for a trip we had to make for the weekend with our kids.  Needless to say, you really get what you pay for.  The room was not very clean, we found two dirty towels in our room that were more than likely left behind by housekeeping the night we arrived and there were hairs on a couple of the pillows.  The room looked as if it was still going through some type of upgrades.  There was paint splatter in the shower and the ceiling, and overall the room just looked real run down. The only thing we really liked about the place was that the beds were pretty comfortable and our A/C worked really well.  We will more than likely not stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is one of those "I need a hotel at the last minute and I'm on a tight budget" type of motels. The hotel is in a quiet area, the guy at the front office was nice.  Online, I saw they had photos of breakfast offerings, which is pretty much like false advertising now since they don't offer any type of breakfast. There was a vending machine in the main office, but it was 90% empty.  The hotel is next to a small car dealership (thought that was funny) and there's not really any place to grab food within walking distance. Beach Blvd does have a lot of options though, you just have to drive to them.  There was a pool, but it's not huge, we didn't use it.   The hotel's in poor condition. The room and everything in it seemed very old. There was a large flat screen tv in room (wow!)
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Place to Crash for Bargain Price near Knotts and Disneyland
Summary: We just wanted a cheap place to crash near Disneyland and Knot's Berry Farm.  The Knights Inn in Stanton was just that.  The two queen beds had clean sheets and were comfortable enough.  We arrived late on Mon. March 30.  We woke after a splendid sleep and ate a good breakfast at a nearby Denny's before embarking on a trip to Disneyland.  We came back to the Hotel at 6:30pm to crash again for a long nap.  We slept like rocks, took showers and headed back to Disney just in time to catch the fireworks.  We closed down Disneyland and came back to the hotel around 1:00am.  We had another good nite sleep and the clerk/owner put on a fresh pot of coffee on just for me around 9am.  This is not a 5 Star resort but we had a great place to crash for two nights and we spent less than $100
Manager Response: none

Summary: 8000 pts for a free night on my aarp wyndham resorts card ,booked a room on a winter  monday.  the place was quiet. toilet n shower worked  so not bad for just 18 hours for a place to hide rest  etc.  bed ? ok on one side  lol  ,had a king .  the downside , no coffee ,hot tub was in need of service and, didnt really like all the cameras down the corridor and the owne,r mgr,s view of the pool spa erea. noisy on beach bl. place is old and not perfect but it worked . room could have been cleaner.  maybe a little overpriced.again i had a free nite .worth maybe 45 a nite
Manager Response: none

Summary: It does seem like they are renovating with the amount of material lying around outside. Our rooms was TERRIBLE!!. Cracks in the bathroom tile with ants crawling around. Bathroom had burn marks and dark scratches along the tub/shower.  Sink had cracks and chips with mildew around the taps.  Used Qtips left along the bed.  So worried about bedbugs that I spent 2 hours phoning around at 2am after all day at Disneyland. Couldn't even dial out on the phone!! Found a wonderful place half hour away.  I was out of there quick with a full refund. Will add pics once I upload them from my iPhone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: booked 3 non smoking room for this weekend (actually just checked out) and one room that we got smelled cigarette smoke room 217,complain to the front, lady offered room 203 but smell is worst and all she said was they are fully booked and sorry...my sister full bottle of bath and body cologne is empty from frequent spraying...its a good thing were always out... and just stayed to sleep which were already very tired!!!the bathroom has hair in the floor in the side...i'm very unsatisfied with this hotel!!!just an advice to the management: to make sure to check all rooms for smoking and non smoking odor coz there is a reason why people chooses non smoking rooms...
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Dirty and shady charge to my credit card.
Summary: The beds were comfortable but that's as good as it gets. We got there finger nails and candy balls(I'm guessing whoppers) and cigarette bud underneath beds. Floor had a hole next to fridge. Bathroom was rusty. On top of that we go home to find a charge of 250$ charged to our account. We called back asking why since it was only a one night stay at 73.00. We were told its because we were smoking!!! My husband and I don't even smoke. So now we are being penalized for a horrible job done by the housekeeper for not picking up before we entered the room. Still waiting on issue to be resolved. Person who charged us was a woman named lily..and the guy we spoke to about resolving the issue is named ray. Don't stay here if you planned on gettn ripped off. If any one has info to contact
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  Our staff did reverse the $250 charge on your card.  If you had several issues with the room then you should had advise the staff so we would had changed the room for you.  Also we had you initial before checking in the room for our fees of smoking/ damages policy.   We constantly check our rooms for any damages and it's quality.

Summary: It was cheap to stay here, but not worth it. Continental Breakfast was a joke. I got donuts with mold on them! There were cockroaches in our room and stains on the blankets. Sure the price was cheap, but I guess I got what I paid for.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us.  We are improving our breakfast in the future.  We currently have pre-packed breakfast, and assure you it is the highest quality breakfast that we purchase. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have received.

Summary Heading: What A Relief! This Place Should Have A Gold Roof!
Summary: OK, Dudes and Dudettes, time to learn to ignore OLD reviews of places...such as the old bad reviews of the Stanton, CA HoJo Inn. This place has done the biggest turnaround since The Bad News Bears. Read on, because this is long, but it matters:   Foolishly buying a prepaid room as cheap as I could in Orange County before reading its reviews, I bought a week at the Howard Johnson - Stanton. The reviews, here and elsewhere (which I read AFTER paying!) were so bad that I called the booking agency and said, "If it's really that bad, will you let me change after I see it." (They said yes.) I was astounded at what I found on arrival: THIS PLACE IS A SECRET JEWEL AND IT'S GOING TO GET BETTER.   I'd never heard of Stanton before, despite living in SoCal fora decade before moving. From
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was just awful. The floor in the bathroom was caving in by the bathtub so you had to be careful where you walked and the room was filthy. Stuff all over the carpet and the bathroom was really dirty especially behind the toilet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your feedback following your stay at the Howard Johnson.   We recently took over this Hotel, and we are working on fixing the property.  I am sorry to hear about your stay at our Hotel before we took over.   I hope you can come stay again in the future with us and I promise your stay here will be much more comfortable than before.  Thank you,  Amit Bhagat

Summary: The shabby guy at the check-in desk on Sunday July 20 2014 at around 1.30pm took a physical imprint of my VISA credit card and within 48 hours I had two fraudulent charges attempted on my VISA account. I am relieved and glad VISA's security department caught both attempts. Howard Johnson should investigate this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on Tripadvisor about your stay with Howard Johnson.   We recently purchased this property with new management.   I apologize for your experience with the Hotel was not a memorable one.  I do hope that you will give us another opportunity in the future to impress you with our service standards.     Thank you once again,  Best regards,  Amit Bhagat
